title: vector
extract: Vector (epidemiology), an organism that transmits a pathogen from reservoir to host. Vector (molecular biology), vehicle used to transfer genetic material to a target cell, such as: Plasmid vector. T-DNA Binary system or binary vector, a cloning vector used to generate transgenic plants.
extract_html: Vector (epidemiology), an organism that transmits a pathogen from reservoir to host. Vector (molecular biology), vehicle used to transfer genetic material to a target cell, such as: Plasmid vector. T-DNA Binary system or binary vector, a cloning vector used to generate transgenic plants.
